title: Revisiting A Blast From The Past With Dave Barry
teaser: Jeremy Hobson took the opportunity to catch up with the writer and humorist, whom he last interviewed in 1993 at the age of 11.
contentencoded:
Writer and humorist Dave Barry has not one, but two books out. His new collection of essays, “Live Right and Find Happiness (Although Beer is Much Faster): Life Lessons and Other Ravings from Dave Barry,” publishes today.

His previous collection, “You Can Date Boys When You’re Forty: Dave Barry on Parenting and Other Topics He Knows Very Little About,” also comes out in paperback today.

When that book came out last year, Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson took the opportunity to catch up with Dave Barry, whom he last interviewed in 1993; Jeremy was 11 at the time. Today we revisit that conversation.

  • Read an excerpt of “You Can Date Boys When You’re Forty”
  • See our original interview and hear Jeremy’s 1993 interview with Dave Barry

Guest

  • Dave Barry, author of “You Can Date Boys When You’re Forty.” He tweets @rayadverb.
